body:
Comment 5: 
could you please tell me the output of this?
unset GOARM
go tool dist env | grep GOARM


So far, the only problem of GOARM auto detection i see is that on some systems,
the kernel doesn't set HWCAP_VFPv3 when cmd/dist indeed detects that VFPv3 is
available. I don't yet understand this problem.
maybe to be safe, we should use SIGILL based check in the runtime instead of relying
on HWCAP from kernel.
